name: Zap'd!
description:
Description:

Embark on an adventure as a carefree moth who's obsessed with lamps. Along the way you'll learn not all lamps are as innocent as they claim to be and some aren't real lamps at all! Team up with brother moths, evade angry bats, dodge spider webs, and fight against mother nature herself to see how far you can go without getting "ZAP'D!"

Credit

All assets (graphics, UI, music, sound effects, code, etc.) were created by myself during the game jam as the solo developer for the project. No external libraries or assets were utilized in the production of this game.

Tools Used:
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Code Development: Visual Studio
  • Graphics: Inkscape, Krita
  • Sound Effects: Audacity
  • Music: Bosca Ceoil
Controls:

Controls can be remapped through the settings menu

  • Pause: Escape Key
  • Move Left: Left Arrow Key
  • Move Right: Right Arrow Key
  • Flap Wings: Spacebar
Thanks for playing!
